Ingredients

Rice (2 1/2 cups), zucchini (2), bell pepper (1), carrots (3), spinach (1 bag), flank steak (1 lb)
Salt, pepper, paprika, garlic 
Kochujang sauce

Cook the rice (2 1/2 cups rice and equal amount of water). 
While rice is cooking, prepare the vegetables. 
Season the steak with salt, pepper, paprika, and olive oil.

Cook the vegetables - a simple stir fry with salt, pepper and garlic seasoning. 
For the flank steak, pan sear for 5 minutes on each side. Let it rest 10 minutes before slicing.

Kochujang sauce - 2 tablespoons korean red chili paste (we substituted this for siracha sauce and red chili powder since we didn't have chili paste), 
2 garlic gloves, 1 tablespoon rice vinegar, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 1 teaspoon sesame oil, 
1 teaspoon toasted sesame seeds, 1 scallion, 2 teaspoons sugar.
Prepare the lunch boxes. We made enough portions for dinner for two (not shown) and two lunches!
This is our first time trying out this "Meal Prep Sunday" idea. I'd say it was a successful first attempt and we will definitely do more meal prep lunches in the future.
